title: Pallotty 90's Kids
overview: Set in the 1990s, Pallotty 90â€™s Kids is a nostalgic coming-of-age drama that follows the deep friendship of two village boys, Kannan and unni, whose love for simple childhood games defines their world. Their bond reflects the innocence, struggles, and beauty of growing up in Kerala during the 90s, while showing how such friendships leave a lasting mark even into adulthood.
